channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- CP-8031 MASTER MODULE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- CP-8031 MASTER MODULE

item.title: CVE-2023-28489|2024-08-02T12:38:25.371Z -- siemens -- cp-8031%20master%20module
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in CP-8031 MASTER MODULE (All versions < CPCI85 V05), CP-8050 MASTER MODULE (All versions < CPCI85 V05). Affected devices are vulnerable to command injection via the web server port 443/tcp, if the parameter “Remote Operation” is enabled. The parameter is disabled by default. The vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to perform arbitrary code execution on the device.
